00001 package newtonERP.viewers.viewerData;

00003 import java.util.Vector;
00004 
00005 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00006 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00007 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00008 
00013 public class SearchBar extends AbstractEntity
00014 {
00015         private String targetUrl;
00016         private String currentSearchEntry;
00017         private int limit;
00018         private int offset;
00019         private Vector<String> possibleOrderList;
00020         private String currentOrder;
00021 
00030         public SearchBar(String targetUrl, String currentSearchEntry,
00031                         AbstractOrmEntity concernedEntity, String currentOrder, int limit,
00032                         int offset)
00033         {
00034                 super();
00035                 this.targetUrl = targetUrl;
00036                 this.currentSearchEntry = currentSearchEntry;
00037                 this.currentOrder = currentOrder;
00038                 this.limit = limit;
00039                 this.offset = offset;
00040                 possibleOrderList = buildPossibleOrderList(concernedEntity);
00041         }
00042 
00046         public String getTargetUrl()
00047         {
00048                 return targetUrl;
00049         }
00050 
00054         public String getCurrentSearchEntry()
00055         {
00056                 return currentSearchEntry;
00057         }
00058 
00062         public Vector<String> getPossibleOrderNameList()
00063         {
00064                 return possibleOrderList;
00065         }
00066 
00067         private Vector<String> buildPossibleOrderList(
00068                         AbstractOrmEntity concernedEntity)
00069         {
00070                 Vector<String> newPossibleOrderList = new Vector<String>();
00071 
00072                 for (Field<?> field : concernedEntity.getFields())
00073                         newPossibleOrderList.add(field.getShortName() + " ASC");
00074 
00075                 for (Field<?> field : concernedEntity.getFields())
00076                         newPossibleOrderList.add(field.getShortName() + " DESC");
00077 
00078                 return newPossibleOrderList;
00079         }
00080 
00084         public String getCurrentOrder()
00085         {
00086                 return currentOrder;
00087         }
00088 
00092         public int getOffset()
00093         {
00094                 return offset;
00095         }
00096 
00100         public int getLimit()
00101         {

00103         }
